mapper.select: SELECT rd.id,rd.receipt_id,rd.prod_id, rd.prod_unit_price,rd.status, p.prod_no,p.prod_name,rd.prod_amount, rd.create_by,rd.create_time,rd.update_by,rd.update_time FROM t_wms_inventory_detail_record rd LEFT JOIN t_wms_receipt_record rp on rp.id = rd.receipt_id and rp.del_flag ='1' LEFT JOIN t_wms_product p on p.id = rd.prod_id and p.del_flag ='1' WHERE rd.del_flag='1' and rp.receipt_no =#{receiptNo}
